statements: SELECT * FROM campaign_funding;
SELECT campaign_name, amount_raised FROM campaign_funding;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, amount_raised FROM campaign_funding WHERE amount_raised > 1000;
SELECT campaign_name FROM campaign_funding ORDER BY campaign_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM campaign_funding WHERE amount_raised BETWEEN 500 AND 2000;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, amount_raised FROM campaign_funding WHERE amount_raised > 5000 ORDER BY amount_raised DESC
SELECT campaign_name, amount_raised FROM campaign_funding WHERE amount_raised BETWEEN 2000 AND 5000 ORDER BY campaign_name ASC
SELECT * FROM campaign_funding WHERE campaign_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT campaign_name, SUM(amount_raised) AS total_amount FROM campaign_funding GROUP BY campaign_name HAVING total_amount > 10000
SELECT AVG(amount_raised) AS average_amount FROM campaign_funding
SELECT * FROM campaigns
SELECT campaign_name, raised_amount FROM campaigns
SELECT * FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 100
SELECT donor_name, donation_date FROM donations ORDER BY donation_date DESC
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(donation_amount) FROM donations GROUP BY campaign_id
SELECT campaign_name, SUM(donation_amount) AS total_raised FROM campaigns INNER JOIN donations ON campaigns.campaign_id = donations.campaign_id GROUP BY campaign_name;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount, donation_date FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 1000 ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, raised_amount FROM campaigns WHERE raised_amount >= 5000 ORDER BY raised_amount DESC;

SELECT campaign_name, donor_name, donation_amount FROM campaigns JOIN donations ON campaigns.campaign_id = donations.campaign_id WHERE donation_amount BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY campaign_name, donor_name ASC;

SELECT campaign_name, COUNT(donation_id) AS total_donations FROM campaigns LEFT JOIN donations ON campaigns.campaign_id = donations.campaign_id GROUP BY campaign_name HAVING total_donations >= 3 ORDER BY campaign_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns;
SELECT donation_id, donation_amount, donor_name, donation_date FROM donations;
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(donation_amount) AS total_amount_raised FROM donations GROUP BY campaign_id;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, total_amount_raised FROM campaigns JOIN campaign_totals ON campaigns.campaign_id = campaign_totals.campaign_id;
SELECT * FROM campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT donations.donation_id, donations.donor_name, donations.donation_amount, campaigns.campaign_name FROM donations JOIN campaigns ON donations.campaign_id = campaigns.campaign_id;

SELECT campaigns.campaign_name, campaign_totals.total_amount_raised FROM campaigns JOIN campaign_totals ON campaigns.campaign_id = campaign_totals.campaign_id WHERE campaign_totals.total_amount_raised > 5000;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM campaign
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaign
SELECT * FROM donor
SELECT donor_name, email FROM donor
SELECT * FROM donation
SELECT * FROM donor WHERE donor_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY donor_name ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaign WHERE start_date > '2020-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT donor.donor_name, donation.amount FROM donor JOIN donation ON donor.donor_id = donation.donor_id WHERE donation.amount > 1000 ORDER BY donation.amount DESC;

SELECT campaign.campaign_name, SUM(donation.amount) AS total_amount FROM campaign JOIN donation ON campaign.campaign_id = donation.campaign_id GROUP BY campaign.campaign_name HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM campaign_totals WHERE campaign_id IN (SELECT campaign_id FROM campaign WHERE end_date < '2022-01-01') AND total_amount_raised > 5000 ORDER BY total_amount_raised DESC;
SELECT * FROM campaign;
SELECT campaign_name, goal_amount FROM campaign;
SELECT start_date, end_date FROM campaign;
SELECT donation_id, donor_name, donation_amount FROM donation;
SELECT participant_name, participant_email FROM campaign_participant;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaign WHERE goal_amount > 1000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT participant_name, participant_email FROM campaign_participant WHERE campaign_id = 3 ORDER BY participant_name ASC;
SELECT donation_amount, donation_date FROM donation WHERE donation_amount >= 50 AND donation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT campaign_name, total_amount_raised, total_donations FROM campaign c JOIN campaign_stats s ON c.campaign_id = s.campaign_id WHERE total_amount_raised > 5000 ORDER BY total_amount_raised DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount, payment_method FROM donation d JOIN payment p ON d.donation_id = p.donation_id WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-04-01' AND '2022-05-31';
